summary: TL* - THE CONTACT CALLED REGARDING THE 2000 VOLVO S80.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT AND THE EMISSION SERVICE LIGHT KEPT TURNING ON, THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 32,000.  THE LOCAL VOLVO DEALER REFUSED TO DIAGNOSE THE  VEHICLE BECAUSE OF PAST  PROBLEMS  REGARDING THE BILL.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THERE WERE NO OTHER VOLVO DEALERS IN HIS AREA.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 55000. FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 32,000. *AK  UPDATED 03/19/07. *JB
